snippet: Senator Rob Portman of Ohio, a sponsor of legislation to analyze independent-agency regulations, and Nancy A. Nord of the Consumer Product Safety Commission respond to an editorial.
abstract: Letters from Sen Rob Portman and Nancy A Nord, commissioner of the Consumer Product Safety Commission, respond to July 6 editorial criticizing bill that would limit independence of regulatory agencies.
lead_paragraph: Senator Rob Portman of Ohio, a sponsor of legislation to analyze independent-agency regulations, and Nancy A. Nord of the Consumer Product Safety Commission respond to an editorial.

headline.main: Rules for Agencies: The Senator and the Commissioner
headline.print_headline: Rules for Agencies: The Senator and the Commissioner
